SEARCH
Module UsefulSchoolPortal
Package objects

Class Infraction

java.lang.Object
objects.Infraction
public class Infraction extends Object
The Infraction class is a representation of an object in the school system. It includes essential fields for an infraction, such as type of infraction and reason.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daniel Santillan

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Infraction(String name, int id, int studentID, int schoolID, int staffID, String reason)
    This constructor builds an existing infraction, as the ID along with the other fields are set by the program parameters from the user.
    Infraction(String name, int studentID, int schoolID, int staffID, String reason)
    This constructor builds a new infraction, as the ID is randomized.

  • Constructor Details

    • Infraction

      public Infraction(String name, int studentID, int schoolID, int staffID, String reason)
      This constructor builds a new infraction, as the ID is randomized. All other fields are set by the program parameters from the user.
      Parameters:
      name - Given name
      studentID - Given student ID
      schoolID - Given school ID
      staffID - Given staff ID
      reason - Given reason

    • Infraction

      public Infraction(String name, int id, int studentID, int schoolID, int staffID, String reason)
      This constructor builds an existing infraction, as the ID along with the other fields are set by the program parameters from the user. This is for an assignment that uses a points system.
      Parameters:
      name - Given name
      id - Given ID
      studentID - Given student ID
      schoolID - Given school ID
      staffID - Given staff ID
      reason - Given reason
